title: Blue team shop keeper
body:
Hello :)

Can anyone tell me the name of the blue team's shop keeper in rift?

 I think she'd make an awesome support champ, and I'd like to draw up some concept art but I need to know her name and back-story (if there even is one) ^_^ 

**Innate** could be a party (as in ballons!) small buff to health regen that increases based on the number if team members in proximity,

**Q** might be extra-armaments where she temp buffs a champ with an extra weapon a bit like Pix! which adds a slow or something,

**W** ? Idk insert cool suggestions here c_c;;

I imagine her** E** dropping little parcels her team can run over  to pick up, with different boosts like attack speed, run speed, health, a bit like pick-a-card on TF but for a droppable buff item. 

Her **ulti** would obviously summon her massive moose..bear..thing who would stomp in like a truck without breaks and eat someone. or perhaps pick up her and one other champ and dash them to safety..

idk, but I like the idea of a grandma-yordle support, if anyone knows her name that would be awesome, ty :)

Best wishes,

luna
